title: Update Instagram URL in Follow Us social links

requirements.summary: Update the Instagram social link URL in the ContactSection “Follow Us” links without changing other social links.
acceptanceCriteria: In frontend/src/components/ContactSection.tsx, the Instagram entry in the socialLinks array uses href === "https://www.instagram.com/myplaceatqueretaro".
The Instagram icon link in the rendered “Follow Us” block navigates to https://www.instagram.com/myplaceatqueretaro in a new tab (target="_blank") and keeps rel="noopener noreferrer".
No other socialLinks (Facebook, YouTube) URLs are changed.

file_operations.description: Change only the Instagram object inside the socialLinks array to set href exactly to "https://www.instagram.com/myplaceatqueretaro", leaving Facebook/YouTube href values and the existing target/rel attributes unchanged.
